name: LB+addr+poxx

final: λss. ∃(mem,thds). (mem,thds) ∈ ss ⇒ (∀fmap. bir_env_lookup "MEM8" mem = SOME (BVal_Mem Bit64 Bit8 fmap) ⇒ FLOOKUP fmap (w2n x) = SOME 1) ∧ (∀fmap. bir_env_lookup "MEM8" mem = SOME (BVal_Mem Bit64 Bit8 fmap) ⇒ FLOOKUP fmap (w2n y) = SOME 1) ∧ bir_env_lookup "x5" (HD thds) = SOME (BVal_Imm (Imm64 1w)) ∧ bir_env_lookup "x11" (EL 1 thds) = SOME (BVal_Imm (Imm64 0w)) ∧ bir_env_lookup "x7" (EL 1 thds) = SOME (BVal_Imm (Imm64 0w)) ∧ bir_env_lookup "x6" (EL 1 thds) = SOME (BVal_Imm (Imm64 1w)) ∧ bir_env_lookup "x10" (EL 1 thds) = SOME (BVal_Imm (Imm64 0w))
